comment: I cannot recommend this professor enough. I cannot emphasize how amazing she is. She is funny & well-versed in her subject and one of the most caring and sweet professors ever. I CANNOT recommend her enough. I'd take her for every class if I could. I LOATHE math & still looked forward to going to her class each day. TAKE HER. You won't regret it.

The best!!! Makes the content easy to understand if you go to class and if you don't, the PowerPoints are easy to understand. Lets you have a whole cheat sheet of notes for tests. Homework is due biweekly but if you go to class at the end of class she opens it up for questions. Very easy to pass and she is available to email.
She makes math easy to understand. She's very kind and wants everyone to do well.
Amazing.
She is one of the best math professors I've ever taken, makes math easy to understand and is caring

Shes a really sweet teacher thats open to questions during and after class on the lectures and HW. Theres 2 HWs weekly but theyre really simple and youre able to do them pretty easily during class and drops the 4 lowest HW grades at the end. Attendance is recommended when confused with HWs and cant read the ppts on D2L. class was an easy A

The material is very easy so just show up to class and listen she explains it well if you actually go. A lot of the power point she presents from is the same as the homework problems with different numbers so you can do it while she presents. If not she will go through any question you ask about on the homework in class and work it out.

Prof Jones is one of the best math instructors I have ever had. She is always open to help with anything. We go over homework in class every time we have a class which is a big help. I would definitely take her again and highly recommend her.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: I was expecting this class to be a breeze but I was wrong. There's very time consuming homeworks due tues/thurs, tests are in person, rarely any multiple choice & are very hard. Her lectures are also long and drawn out. If you're already good at math, take her. But if you struggle with math, please do not. she also DOES NOT offer extra credit.

I would definitely recommend Professor Jones she was an amazing teacher. She went up and beyond that teachers are required to do. She walks you step by step on how to do anything. She also acts like you don't know how to use the calculator so she walks you through how to use it. I did not think that I was going to do as well in this class as I did.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Prof. Jones is amazing! Her lectures are clear and she makes sure that everyone is on the same page before moving on. Her class consists of 4 tests and daily homework. For the tests, she allows you to bring a note sheet. She is accessible outside of class and ver kind. Take her!

The best math teacher. Her grades consist of 2 weekly homework assignments which are done online (you get multiple attempts), 4 test which are done in class (you can use a note sheet), a bonus homework, and the final(you can use a note sheet). She answers every question and go over what you dont understand. Make sure you have a graphing calculator

Prof Jones was the best math teacher I have ever had. She is so kind to all of her students and tests weren't hard at all! She is very generous with her grading on test. You have 4 tests and 1 final. I passed all of them and ended the class with a 98. Homework was also very easy and she gives you 100 tries on each question.

BEST PROFESSOR ALIVE. I am not good at math and I finished with a 100% in the class. 4 exams, homework weekly, and lets you use a cheat sheet for exams. Her office hours are amazing and she is so kind and wants to see her students pass. Very intellectual and gracious for grades. Love her
She is very kind, and try's to help in any way she can to help students understand

I absolutely LOVE Professor Jones. She has been so kind and understanding all throughout the semester and is incredibly lenient in her grading. She really wants to make sure all her students pass as well as possible. You're allowed to take a piece of copy paper to the test as a cheat sheet. She's always there if you ever have questions!

Professor Jones bas been honestly such a good professor and is always open to questions and makes sure to go slow when lecturing. There is homework pretty often but it's easy. Exams are also easy, because its very similar to practice exam & you're allowed to bring in a sheet of paper in to help you. Awesome professor!

I loved Professor Jones. She wants all of her students to do well in the course. Lectures are entertaining and informative so attend class regularly. Attend office hours if possible. She gives you a week to complete each homework assignment. She also allows her students to take test with cheat sheets. I would definitely recommend. Easy A Average.

Wonderful professor. Really strives for everyone to do well in her class. Gives homework every week, but does a lot to make sure that everyone understands it. Tests are easy because she goes over the material well. I'm horrible at math she really has taught me a lot.
shes super nice and really just wants you to pass! gives light homework and even goes over it with you if you need help. its a really easy class and i highly recommend taking her course !
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor Jones is literally the best Professor Ive ever had. As a person who struggles with Math, she made me feel very comfortable and eager to learn. I would 100% recommend her class to anyone!!! Especially if your looking for an easy A!

This professor is a blessing!!! She cares about her students and only wants us to succeed. I myself am not a math genius but with her teaching she made me feel confident. TAKE HER YOU WONT REGRET IT!!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: She truly is the best instructor I have ever had. She gives you step by step process of how to solve each problem. Requires a TI-84 calculator, online textbook/homework, 4 tests, 1 Final Exam (super easy! Lets you use your notes). She wants her students to know how to solve the problem, rather than fail by memorization. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND HER!

Professor Jones is such a nice lady! She truly cares about her students wellbeing inside and outside of the classroom. The course is very simple math, and she gives homework on each class day. It is very easy and sets you up for the test. Highly recommend!

Such an amazing and sweet teacher! She answers ALL questions, even if they're braindead dumb. Class is easy, and lectures are straight forward. Homework every class day, but they're SUPER simple. Tests are identical to homework, so it's easy to study. I highly recommend!! 10/10, Love you Tonya <3
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Math is definitely not my strongest subject, but Professor Jones really helped me. Her lectures are in great detail and she is always willing to take any questions if you don't understand. There is a lot of homework, but if you do it all and make As on each one it can really help your grade and class average! Her tests are pretty straight forward.

Listen, I am terrible at math and still got an A. She is such a good teacher and really helps you understand the material. She is truly one of the best math teachers I have had in my entire life. If you have the opportunity to do so take this class!!! You will not regret it.

Easiest math class I've ever had. Attendance isn't mandatory but it is recommended since the lecture coincides with the homework. 4 tests, 25 homework assignments (easy), and 1 final. EASY if you simply put effort. For the tests you have more than a day to take them and you can use your notes! She's so nice too!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Professor Jones was absolutely outstanding. I was so nervous to take a college level math course but MATH 1101 was actually easy content and Professor Jones explains things very well. She is kind and understanding. I couldnt recommend her more. Four tests & a final, over 20 hw assignments but theyre no big deal. Take her if you get the chance!
AMAZING TEACHER!!!!!! She explains the material so well and makes sure you understand, ALWAYS responds very quickly to emails, and tests are super easy! Nicest and the best prof I've ever had!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: I loved her !!! if you suck at math and I mean you just are terrible, take her!! everything makes complete sense, she is willing to help with anything. She responds fast, no textbook, no ALEKS! we have 4 tests but you have two days to do it and there word docs. Everything on the test is literally same thing on homework

Ms. Jones is literally the sweetest person I've ever met. I was retaking this course after getting a C the first time online. She is not out to trick you. Her lectures are over the homework, which is exactly what's on the test. If you listen and do the homework there's no way you won't get an A. She is a GREAT math teacher!!!

Very nice professor. Personally, her teaching style just wasn't enough to keep me engaged/focused but I can tell she's a great professor. She really helps her students understand the material and even goes over homework and questions. She replies to emails quickly if you ever need to reach out to her. Super sweet lady! Would recommend.
Best professor I have had so far. Makes math super easy. Tests are not that hard. She gives out a practice test to help you study. I would 100% recommend taking her class.

Ms. Jones is by far one of the best math tea hers ive had. Her lectures are clear and she goes over what'll be on the test and the homework even gives out test study guides. I haven't failed a single test she drops the lowest 5 of the homeworks. 10/10 highly recommend taking her.

Professor Jones was great. I never do well in math but she made it incredibly easy to understand and always used real life examples to help the understanding of concepts. Very sweet lady who genuinely wants to see her students succeed and a wonderful choice for anyone that isnt the strongest in math
If you want relatively easy professor that is disconnected and slow, she is for you. Class isn't hard and assignments are evenly spaced.

She was one of my favorite professors I've had by far!! She is very caring and takes the time to make sure everyone understands and that everyone can pass the tests with flying colors. She had a review day before each test and would answer any questions, a lot of which were the same questions used on the test! Amazing professor!!

Professor Jones is my absolute favorite professor. She is passionate about making sure people understand the material and will more than willingly help you with anything you're confused with. I've yet to make below a 100 on any of the tests. Her class was so easy for me, and I would take her again in a heartbeat.
Really sweet and passionate lady! Answers all your questions very thoroughly.

She was the best and most passionate teacher ever!! If I could take her for all my classes, I would! I highly recommend her to anyone! She will help you through every single problem!! Doesn't mind staying over a few minutes and is very funny! I absolutely loved her and always will ! Class -Math 1101

I TOOK MRS. JONES CLASS FOR 97 AND 98. SHE IS AMAZING! TREATS YOU WITH RESPECT, IS VERY FRIENDLY AND HAPPY. IF YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND SOMETHING, SHE WILL TRY THE PROBLEM AGAIN AND NOT MAKE YOU FEEL STUPID. I WOULD TAKE HER FOR ALL OF MY CLASSES IF I COULD! BEST TEACHER I HAVE HAD AT KSU SINCE I HAVE BEEN THERE.

BEST PROFESSOR AT KENNESAW. Always helpful, very happy and more than willing to help you understand. First math course that I had left and actually understood what was going on. Wish I could take her again. Lucky enough to get her 2 semesters in a row. IF YOU CAN TAKE HER YOU NEED TO!!!
Great teacher! Helpful and gives clear direction. One of the nicest professors at KSU.
She cares about your success. Probably want to attend class regularly to understand and ask questions. Drops lowest test grade with final grade. Test 3 is hard. Do all homework assignments.
AMAZING! She is the bomb! I took her for both 0097 and 0098 and passed with A's. Highly recommend her.

Overall great professor, teaches with clarity and answers all questions thoroughly. Only assigned seven questions per section on MyMathLab and had optional practice in the book. Helped me to understand math very well. Would recommend!

Mrs. Jones has got to be the Goddess of patience. She will explain the same thing over and over with a smile. She loves math and wants to see you pass. I went from getting an F on my first test, to getting A's on the rest. She drops your lowest score at the end of the semester. I loved her energy.
I love Mrs. Jones! She is the best Math teacher I have ever had.
Best class, best teacher I have ever had. I love Professor Jones.

Prof Jones explains math for all to understand. She is patient, helpful, and grades fairly. Tests & homework online (so is the book so you don't need the text). Tests online but she grades scrap test & gives points(or partial) up to where you went wrong. Take her...I avoided this class for 3 semesters & got a C.

Mrs. Jones is amazing. She knows what she is doing and loves doing it. She makes it easy to learn and understand and is always willing to help in any way she can. She is by far my favorite teacher I've had in a very long time.
Ms. Jones was awesome! very clear and patient teacher.

Fantastic teacher. If had teachers like her in high school I wouldnt need learning support classes. The things that I was supposed to learn in high school finally make sense! I actually understand what going on in class now...
Excellent teacher who is extremely helpful, she makes math and learning the formulas very easy.
If my high school math teachers were as good as her I probably wouldn't be in the support program to begin with. Everything I "learned" in high school finally makes sense.

Ms. Jones is amazing. She taught everything really clearly and made me understand what I learned in high school so much better. I'm bad at math but right now I have a 100 in the class. Study the practice tests and listen to her in class, and you'll for sure get a good grade too!
She is really helpful and nice. Take her!
Ms. Jones is AWESOME!!

LOVE LOVE LOVE Professor Jones.  Shes so nice and patient.  She taught me that math IS possible for me, and I will always be grateful to her for that.  If there is anyway you can get into this class... DO IT!

WONDERFUL TEACHER!!!! She makes sure you understand the material. She always respond to emails (day or night and even weekends) She makes math so simple and she is sooo sweet. If you have been out of school for more than 10 years...please take her math class. SHE IS THE BEST!!!!!!!!!

I have never enjoyed math, nor have I been good at it. Mrs. Jones made the class enjoyable, if that is possible. She is very clear when explaining how to do things. She is always available for help. I would recommend her to anyone; especially if you have not taken a math course in a while.

Very helpful don't hesitate to get help soon and often. She holds office hrs 2x a week.You must take all your own notes.It is very easy if you do your part and get the help you need.Visit the math lab,adult learning center,& Mrs.Jones for help.Also,the compass was easy don't stress it.Practice the compass review stuff she tells u & you'll ace it.

Ms. Jones is a very thorough instructor.  She will take the time to show you until you understand.  It was frustrating for someone that doesn't require that level of instruction but I took her class because I figured it better to make sure to have a great instructor than to have a lousy one.

Absolutely WONDERFUL teacher! I love this teacher! She is very caring, friendly, understanding, and always motivating. She makes everyone feel comfortable, and encourages students to ask questions. She likes to point out that she often mistakes too, in order to help the class understand that it's ok to mess up. I'm praying I can get her for MATH 98
Sweet teacher! Goes out of her way to help. Explains each section clearly.

Mrs. Jones is a wonderful teacher. She is very kind and caring math professor.Had her for both 97 and 98 and she was great and explains math well. If you are an adult leearner she is the teacher you need.I got a "A" in 97 during the spring semester and a "B" in 98 during the summer semester and have been out of school for 27 years.
Two thumbs up!  I normally suck at math and I'll be finishing with an A.  Very nice, very helpful, explains everything clearly and will rinse and repeat until you get it.  Thanks Tonya!  =)

MS JONES IS TRULY A KIND AND CARING MATH PROFESSOR.  SHE ASSISTS YOU IF YOU NEED THE HELP AND MAKE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND.  IF YOU ARE AN ADULT LEARNER, PLS CONSIDER HER.  YOU WILL DEFINITELY LEARN ALGEBRA IN HER CLASS, I PROMISE YOU!  I GOT AN "A" AND I HADN'T BEEN TO SCHOOL IN 37-YEARS!!!!THANKS MS JONES
Excellent teacher. She makes learning math fun and is very helpful if extra assistance is needed. Take her class....

Mrs. Jones is a wonderful teacher.  If you are an adult learner be sure and take her class.  I was sure that I would do well to make a "D" in this class and I have a solid "A" for now.  She says what she means and means what she says.  There will be no surprises.  Very solid and nice teacher.
Great teacher! Very helpful and caring! If you can't pass her class, you don't need to be in college.
awsome teacher1
Amazing teacher.  If you need help in math, or are scared by it, please take her class.  She listens to you, and tries to address your needs individually and wants to see everyone get it...
You could not ever ask for a better teacher.... she cares whether understand or comprehend the material. she will spend as much time with you as needed. she is the most caring prof i have ever had.

She is better than our book! Will take time to help, will explain concepts until they make sense! Cute and easy to get along with. Will review for tests with pretests which are exact copies of the test! Do the homeworks and pretests--they do help! Excellent teacher and very nice lady!

I have math disabilities and took Mrs Jones more than once.She is very helpful, extends office hours and to sit in on her other classes. Have never witnessed her being rude! Thanks to Mrs Jones I passed her class with a high B and actually understand!
She's really good. She's fun and sweet and really helps you understand the math. Do hmwk to ensure your success!! She's AWESOME :)

Sweet lady. She kind of dumbs Math down a little to make sure everyone understands it. She understands that Learning Support has consequences if you fail and wants to make sure you pass. Excellent teacher if Math scares you. I took her for 97 as well.
Very good teacher. I would take again.
I have to agree with the other post about her being rude to an extent.  She was the same way towards me.  Maybe she has her favorites, and if this is true then she does not need to be teaching!
She is a good teacher who can throughly explain the material so students can understand! Highly recommend her for learning support students.

YEAH RIGHT!  I went to class, was on time, asked questions and did homework...still rude!  I made a "C" (78%) in her class!  Thank God, it does not affect my GPA.  She kind of sneeringly told me my grade after I took my final, as if the "C" was crap.  Hey, I tell you what...I'll take my "C" and I'll hopefully "C" her never again!
If you can get her DO IT!!! She is always there if you need her, and I feel very lucky to have her..I HOPE SHE WOULD TEACH COLLEGE LEVEL SOON!!!!!

She is very effective and willing to help any time.  She really takes the time with the class to be sure that everyone understands.  If you don't understand something, speak up- she won't make you feel stupid at all even if you feel it is.  I loved her class and will be taking my next class with her.  We fought to get in to her class next semester.
Mrs. Jones is a sweetheart! math has always been my worst subject and she's so willing to accommodate me with tutoring and is doing everything she can to help me pass!

Mrs. Jones makes class lively and not so bad for those of us that cringe at the thought of math.  Her cute country accent helps,  too.  In my opinion she is an excellent professor,  and I recommend her for anyone who has to take LS classes. She wants to make sure you know the material and reviews well before exams.

Prof Jones is the absolute best instructor I have ever learned from. She is very helpful and clear on her material. She really wants you to pass her classes. In the past 42 years the most complicated math I had was balancing my checkbook.If U have to take math 0097 or 0098, you have to get her!
She's very helpful and clear.  I learned a lot in this class!

I love the way she teaches. She breaks everything down so you completely understand it. If you go to class and take notes it will be an Easy B, alot of her questions come from the optional homework so if you do that then you will have an easy A no problem. Take Her She is GREAT!!!

THIS TEACHER WAS BY FAR THE BEST MATH TEACHER I HAVE EVER HAD! I would highly recommend taking her esp. if you dont understand math. She is nice, funny, and cares about every student in her class. Attendence is not mandatory, but if you go  her class, take notes, and do the assignments you will do great. It was an easy A.
she is a really good teacher. she knows her information. if you pay attention in class and take your notes, you should be ok. her tests are not hard. but not easy either.

Mrs.Jones is the best Math teacher ever!!  I wish I could have her for everyone of my Math courses at KSU!  She wrote excellent notes, really good reviews before exams, and was extremely helpful.  If you email her a question she responds promptly.  I highly recommend her.  I am terrible in Math, and I got a 98 A in her class!  I miss her!

I have not been in school for over 40years and was NOT looking forward to algebra. With Ms Jones being the teacher I have gained confidence in this class and am doing great, all because of her teaching method. She is a caring teacher!! If I could have her for every math class that would be great
She is very good at teaching this subject.  I will take all of her classes if possible.
She is very clear in how she relates her lessons for you to understand.  I will be looking for her for my next class.
I would take her for all my math classes if I could!  She explains things so clear and won't give up until you understand it.  I will miss her next semester.
Love Ms. Jones! She is a very good teacher. Very clear in her teaching. Don't miss alot of classes or you will be behind in the class. Very helpful. Easy A
WONDERFUL teacher! Very helpful and clear about a subject that I've never understood before taking her class.
Cooperative and friendly- thorough!
She was extremely helpful and was great at teaching, best teacher I have had so far!!
AMAZING TEACHER! Best math teacher I have ever had! She is very good at teaching the material and is a very sweet lady! I am so glad I took her class! :o)

The BEST math teacher I have ever had since my academic matriculation as a student.  She breaks everything down and answers all questions.  She doesn't speak to you like you are a mathematician nor does she make you feel ashamed to ask the simplest question. You will instantly love that bubbling personality too!
She is an AMAZING  professor! Made my most difficult subject alot easier.  Defintely would take this professor again!
Great Teacher!! very easy and cooperative
No Comments
really helpful and easy to get along with.
best math teacher i have taken since high school. I actually get algebra. I WOUDL RECOMEND HER TO ANYONE!
GREAT TEACHER....i am so stupid at math but she helps sooooooo much....everyone shoudl have her... her class is easy too. She is very helpful and i actually got math with her.
She helped me understand Algebra better than I did in High School and I feel comfortable moving on to Calc.
very helpful, understanding and easy teacher.

Great Teacher.  I would recommend her to anyone, especially if you have problems understanding the math work.  she will make sure you understand it.  And she also makes it fun to learn.  I liked her so much I made sure I took her for 97 and 98.
I happen to love Algebra, but even if you don't Ms. Jones makes it easy to understand. She's more than willing to assist a student with a problem.  I would recommend her to anyone.
This teacher is so nice and helpful. your grades come from your test she let's you know everything that will be on the test so there are no surprises. Willing to take extra time out to help.

Is the best at helping someone who isn't a math geek understand algebra. She's ready to help anyone for as long as it takes to be successful. Highly recommend her class if you need a refresher or some remedial math help!
she is one of the nicest teachers i have ever had. i highly recomend her and as well she is ALWAYS there to help if you need it! Get her you wont regret it!!
Great teacher. Breaks everything down in layman terms. Get her if you can. She is also very nice.
